drug.name: Artefenomel
drug.description: Artefenomel has been investigated for the treatment of Malaria.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as phenol ethers. These are aromatic compounds containing an ether group substituted with a benzene ring.

drug-interaction.name: Artemether
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of QTc prolongation can be increased when Artefenomel is combined with Artemether.
